com.gregorczuk.romantoarabic.server.model

Class IncorrectDataException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.gregorczuk.romantoarabic.server.model.IncorrectDataException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IncorrectDataException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Class of exception. Can be thrown to signalise incorrect data. E.g. wrong format of Rome numeral.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Patryk Gregorczuk
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
